m_szDocTitle: Patent US8691441 - Graphene-enhanced cathode materials for lithium batteries - Google Patents
m_szDocSumamry: Graphene-enhanced cathode materials for lithium batteries US 8691441 B2 Abstract A nano graphene-enhanced particulate for use as a lithium battery cathode active material, wherein the particulate is formed of a single or a plurality of graphene sheets and a plurality of fine cathode active material particles with a size smaller than 10 Î¼m (preferably sub-micron or nano-scaled), and the graphene sheets and the particles are mutually bonded or agglomerated into an individual discrete particulate with at least a graphene sheet embracing the cathode active material particles, and wherein the parti
